title: Early Family Maths (EFM) App Study
description: Analysed focus-group and interview data to assess how a mobile app fosters parent-child maths play in Kenya; delivered actionable insights to designers.

title: Kakamega & Tanga STEM Youth BootCamps
description: Planned and facilitated multi-day hands-on STEM camps reaching 100+ students in Kenya and Tanzania.

title: Swahili PhET Simulation Translation
description: Translated >200 Physics Education Technology (PhET) simulations into Swahili, making interactive resources accessible to East-African learners.
